*[[Quick Ball#Shops|Shops]] *[[Quick Ball#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Quick Ball''' is a type of [[Poké Balls|Poké Ball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Poké Ball active and there is a remaining supply in the Poké Ball selector. ==Details== A specialized Poké Ball to capture Pokémon with. It provides an increased catch rate on routes with fewer Pokémon defeated, and an increased catch rate in Dungeons with more time remaining.
